dt-api.name: select.info()
dt-api.summary: Get / set the information summary display state

type.returns: Current state - `true` if information summary shown, `false` otherwise. Note that if multiple tables are defined in the API's context, only the information state of the first table will be returned.
type.description: Get the summary information display state for the table.

type.parameter: Value to set for the information summary display state - `true` to enable, `false` to disable.
type.description: Set the information summary display state for the table's selection options.

dt-api.description:
By default Select will show information in the table's summary element (`dt-init info`) summarising how many items are displayed. This method provides the ability to dynamically enable and disable that option.
Note that the display will not be immediately updated when toggling this value - it will be updated at the next table draw which can be triggered using the `dt-api draw()` method.

example.title: Disable the information summary display using the API
